thing-type.label: LogTailer
thing-type.description: Reader Thing for LogReader Binding using org.apache.ommons.io.input.Tailer

parameter.name: filePath
parameter.label: Log file path
parameter.description: Give path to log file. Empty will default to ${OPENHAB_LOGDIR}/openhab.log

parameter.name: refreshRate
parameter.label: Refresh rate
parameter.description: Refresh rate in milliseconds for reading logs

parameter.name: warningPattern
parameter.label: Warning Pattern
parameter.description: Warning search pattern. Empty will default to WARN+

parameter.name: warningBlacklistingPatterns
parameter.label: Warning Blacklisting Patterns
parameter.description: Warning search pattern for blacklisting unwanted warnings separated by | character.

parameter.name: errorPattern
parameter.label: Error Pattern
parameter.description: Error search pattern. Empty will default to ERROR+

parameter.name: errorBlacklistingPatterns
parameter.label: Error Blacklisting Patterns
parameter.description: Error search pattern for blacklisting unwanted warnings separated by | character.
